title: Baby Animals
description: What does a baby elephant's skin feel like? This touch and feel novelty book for the very young allows the child to explore the different textures of the cutest baby animals. One of a series of Touch and Feel books, Baby Animals features full-colour photographs of a range of animals accompanied by tactile patches to encourage the child to feel explore and touch all their different textures. Tough and sturdy for little hands to hold the simple text and bright pictures make the books ideal for a parent and child to share.
author: Jennifer Quasha
